name: Akwid
description: '''Akwid''' is a [[Chicano rap]] group. Brothers Francisco "AK" Gómez and Sergio "Wikid" Gómez, who make up Akwid, are originally from [[Jiquilpan]], [[Michoacán]], but grew up in [[Los Angeles]], [[California]]. Before becoming Akwid both "AK" and "Wikid" were part of a former rap group named the "Head Knockerz" with other group members Sabu and John Doe
